about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a creative developer who bridges the gap between design and technology. My journey began with visual storytelling and evolved into crafting digital experiences that are both beautiful and functional. I believe great software starts with understanding people and their needs.

graphicDesign.title: Graphic Design
graphicDesign.description: Started with visual communication, learning how color, typography, and composition can convey powerful messages and create emotional connections.

freelance.title: Freelance Experience
freelance.description: Worked with diverse clients across industries, delivering design solutions that solved real business problems while maintaining creative integrity.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: Transitioned into digital product design, focusing on user-centered design principles and creating interfaces that are intuitive, accessible, and delightful.

iti.title: ITI & Full-Stack Development
iti.description: Deepened my technical expertise through intensive training, learning how to build robust applications from frontend to backend while maintaining design sensibilities.

currentFocus.title: Current Focus
currentFocus.description: Specializing in modern frontend development with Angular, creating scalable, performant applications that seamlessly integrate design and engineering.

problemFirst.title: Problem-first thinking
problemFirst.description: I start by understanding the core challenge and user needs before diving into solutions.

designFirst.title: Design before code
designFirst.description: Visual and interaction design guide the development process, ensuring purposeful implementation.

cleanCode.title: Clean, scalable frontend
cleanCode.description: I write maintainable code that grows with the product and team.

collaboration.title: Collaboration & iteration
collaboration.description: I believe the best products emerge from continuous feedback and improvement.

about.closing: My approach combines creative vision with technical precision. I believe that the best digital experiences emerge when design thinking and engineering excellence work together - not as separate disciplines, but as complementary parts of a unified craft. Every line of code I write serves both the user's needs and the product's aesthetic vision.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.intro: Real-world challenges require practical solutions. These case studies showcase my approach to problem-solving, from initial research through implementation and iteration. Each project represents a unique intersection of user needs, business goals, and technical constraints.

onboarding.title: Redesigning Product Onboarding Flow
onboarding.description: Transformed a complex 8-step onboarding process into an intuitive 3-step journey, resulting in 40% higher completion rates and improved user satisfaction through data-driven design decisions.

dashboard.title: Building Reusable Dashboard UI System
dashboard.description: Developed a comprehensive design system and component library for enterprise dashboards, enabling consistent user experiences across multiple products while reducing development time by 60%.

performance.title: Performance Optimization for Content-Heavy Site
performance.description: Achieved 3x faster load times and 90+ Lighthouse scores through strategic code splitting, lazy loading, and optimization techniques while maintaining full functionality.

caseStudies.closing: Each case study represents a journey from problem to solution, highlighting the collaborative process, technical decisions, and measurable outcomes that drive successful digital products.
